document_data.name: Baerdra Monthor
document_data.mainbody: '''Baerdra Monthor''' was a noblewoman in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Baerdra Monthor, a native [[Marsember]] inhabitant, was one of the guests of Lady [[Joysil Ambrur]] in the mid-to-late spring of {{yearlink|1373}}. On the day in which Lady [[Joysil Ambrur]] departed Marsember to go after [[Vangerdahast]], Baerdra Monthor made no end of venomous comments regarding the [[Obarskyr]] family, openly claiming to delight in their misfortune. She impugned [[Tanalasta Obarskyr]]'s flirtation with converting to the faith of [[Chauntea]], her romance with the traitor [[Rowen Cormaeril]], challenged the parentage of their child, [[Azoun Obarskyr V]], and questioned the honor of the regent [[Alusair Obarskyr]].
